@graph.name: Sesame Garlic Broccoli Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Sesame Garlic Broccoli needs just 6 ingredients. Blanched Broccoli with simple dressing of garlic roasted with sesame oil. Vegan glutenfree nutfree recipe soyfree option

@graph.name: Sesame Garlic Broccoli
@graph.description: This Sesame Garlic Broccoli needs just 6 ingredients. It is vibrant with blanched broccoli and delicious with a simple dressing of garlic roasted with sesame oil. A perfect side. Vegan glutenfree nutfree recipe. Soyfree option
recipeIngredient: 2  small heads of broccoli (, cut into florets)
2  large cloves of garlic (, finely chopped or thin small slices)
2 tsp soy sauce (, use tamari for glutenfree, coconut aminos for soyfree)
sesame seeds and red pepper flakes for garnish (, while and black sesame seeds)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add a generous pinch of salt. Add the broccoli and cook for 3 to 5 mins (depends on the size of the florets and amount of florets to water).
recipeInstructions.name: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add a generous pinch of salt. Add the broccoli and cook for 3 to 5 mins (depends on the size of the florets and amount of florets to water).

recipeInstructions.text: Once the broccoli is bright green, take off heat, drain and wash with cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the broccoli is bright green, take off heat, drain and wash with cold water.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium low heat. Once the oil is hot, add garlic, reduce heat to low. Mix well and cook until the garlic is golden. 4 to 5 mins. (Slow cooking the garlic will roast it without burning).
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium low heat. Once the oil is hot, add garlic, reduce heat to low. Mix well and cook until the garlic is golden. 4 to 5 mins. (Slow cooking the garlic will roast it without burning).

recipeInstructions.text: Add sesame seeds and sesame oil and continue to cook until the seeds start to change color.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sesame seeds and sesame oil and continue to cook until the seeds start to change color.

recipeInstructions.text: Add soy sauce, red pepper flakes and mix well for a few seconds. Add a tbsp of water and mix and take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add soy sauce, red pepper flakes and mix well for a few seconds. Add a tbsp of water and mix and take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle over broccoli or add broccoli to the skillet and mix well. Add a dash of salt and pepper to taste. Serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle over broccoli or add broccoli to the skillet and mix well. Add a dash of salt and pepper to taste. Serve.

@graph.keywords: broccoli with garlic sauce, chinese garlic broccoli, garlic broccoli, sesame broccoli
